Sets debugging output via option.
---
{"debug":true}
---
<vue-component-doc>testcase</vue-component-doc>
---
<vue-component-doc-test language="html">
<template v-slot:code>testcase</template>
<template v-slot:result>testcase</template>
</vue-component-doc-test>

<vue-component-doc-test language="html">
<template v-slot:code>testcase</template>
